about_the_game:
Help Elena's grandma retrieve her precious memories from the past in Memoria! A compelling story-driven adventure through grandma's neighbourhood. Dive into unique 2.5D platformer challenges located in the mysterious past to collect grandma's memories.

Exploration


Explore grandma's neighborhood as Elena, a curious grandchild who likes to visit her grandma every summer! Discover the secrets in grandma's detailed house and learn about everything through playful interactions, compelling conversations and intriguing visuals.

Story


Dive into an immersive story-line with a strong socially oriented message about a granddaughter trying to care for her grandmother.

Challenge


Help Elena care for her grandmother by collecting memories! You have to overcome intense and unique challenges to collect these memories from mysterious places located in the past!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
